A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a good movie\, but does not live up to the quality of the two most recent adventures in the galaxy far\, far away. It seems to chide you for becoming immersed in the feature\, dragging you back into reality with poor attempts at comedic relief far too frequently. It aims to be a new Empire Strikes Back\, but is too afraid of emotional depth to let itself flourish.
